item.title: EP 85 - Part 1: Before E3
item.itunes:subtitle: Part 1: Before E3
item.itunes:summary: Join us for another awesome episode as we discuss the possibilities of Alan Wake 2, the change of pace with Gears of War: Judgement and the new game from Bungie that will be exclusive on Xbox 360! Episode 85 is over an hour long. Games investigated in this episode include: Alan Wake 2, Gears of War: Judgement, Dead Space 3, Project Destiny, Star Wars 1313, Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2, Bioshock Infinite, Metro: Last Light, DmC: Devil May Cry, South Park: The Game, Tomb Raider, Prey 2, Aliens: Colonial Marines, XCOM, Gods Among Us, WWE 13, Guardians of Middle Earth, Diablo 3, Steel Battalion: Heavy Armor, NBA 2k13, Elder Scrolls Skyrim: Dawnguard DLC, Mass Effect 3, DOOM 3: BFG Edition, Naughty Bear: Panic in Paradise, Dead Island, Dark Souls, Minecraft, Forza Motorsport 4, Forza Horizon, LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes, LEGO Lord of the Rings, CastleStorm, Mini Ninjas Adventures, Kung Fu Superstar ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 84 - Lord of Terror
item.itunes:subtitle: Lord of Terror
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss Max Payne 3, the ups and downs of Diablo 3, lawsuits and the reasons why government loans do not mix with the gaming industry. Episode 84 is about two hours long. Games investigated in this episode include: Diablo 3, Max Payne 3, Minecraft, Halo 4, Mass Effect 3, Borderlands 2, Darksiders 2, Call of Duty: Black Ops 2, Gotham City Impostors, Final Fantasy XIII 2, Far Cry 3, Dark, Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, Joy Ride Turbo, Omerta: City of Gangsters, Serious Sam 3 ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 83 - Bad Meets Evil II
item.itunes:subtitle: Bad Meets Evil II
item.itunes:summary: Bad meets evil once again as we discuss the possibilities of Internet Explorer on 360, pressure sensitive controllers and the outrage of Bioshock Infinite being delayed until next year. Episode 83 is an hour long. Games investigated in this episode include: Bioshock Infinite, Dead Space 3, Call of Duty: Black Ops 2, Max Payne 3, Diablo 3, Minecraft, The Walking Dead, Ghost Recon: Future Soldier, Hitman: Absolution, Dishonored, Prototype 2, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, LEGO Lord of the Rings, Sons of Anarchy, Tony Hawk Pro Skater HD, Pinball FX 2, FIFA 12 Euro ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 82 - Flamboyant
item.itunes:subtitle: Flamboyant
item.itunes:summary: The most flamboyant podcast on the planet earth has returned for another week of news and shenanigans! Join us this week as we discuss the destruction of Inside Xbox, console payment plans and the future of Call of Duty. Episode 82 is almost one and a half hour long. Games investigated in this episode include: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2, Max Payne 3, Diablo 3, The Witcher 2, Fable Heroes, Sonic and Sega All Stars Racing: Transformed, Family Guy: Back to the Multiverse, Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, Saints Row: The Third, Joy Ride Turbo, Batman: Arkham City, Pinball FX 2, Ms Splosion Man ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 81 - Konkrete Roze
item.itunes:subtitle: Konkrete Roze
item.itunes:summary: This week FTR is joined by Smoke the Immortal and we discuss possibilities for the first Skyrim DLC, lots of leaked info on Black Ops 2, plus the multiplayer betas for Hybrid and Ghost Recon: Future Soldier! Episode 81 is almost two hours long! Games investigated in this episode include: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2, Ghost Recon: Future Soldier, Hybrid, The Walking Dead, BloodForge, Dragons Dogma, Rayman Origins 2, Zwei, Steel Battalion, Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2, Gotham City Impostors, Battlefield 3, Batman: Arkham City, Forza Motorsport 4, Skull Girls ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 80 - El Diablo
item.itunes:subtitle: El Diablo
item.itunes:summary: This week the FTR crew explores the fall of the gaming industry, the magic of the Diablo 3 Beta, the never ending possibilities of Trails Evolution and the extreme challenges in The Witcher 2 on Xbox 360! Episode 80 is about an hour and a half long. Games investigated in this episode include: Diablo 3, The Witcher 2, Halo 4, Crysis 3, Trials Evolution, Darksiders 2, Dragons Dogma, Gotham City Impostors, Prey 2, FEZ, Retro City Rampage, Batman: Arkham City, Dirt Showdown, The Banner Saga ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 79 - Fus Roh Dah
item.itunes:subtitle: Fus Roh Dah
item.itunes:summary: Join us for another crazy week of Xbox mania as we discuss the cancellation of games that could have been great, a much needed Netflix update, the death of Microsoft Points and Jessia Chobots new hair style! Episode 79 is over an hour and a half long. Games investigated in this episode include: Crysis 3, Lost Planet 3, Grand Theft Auto V, Hitman: Absolution, Ghost Recon: Future Soldier, Resident Evil 6, Gears of War: Exile, Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2, Sleeping Dogs, Joy Ride Turbo, Kinect Star Wars, Mass Effect 3, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, Binary Domain, Tekken Tag Tournament 2, Street Fighter X Tekken, Fez, Skylanders, Gears of War 3, Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City, Bulletstorm ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 78 - The Golden Poo
item.itunes:subtitle: The Golden Poo
item.itunes:summary: The forces of nature have dropped a golden poo on the whole industry! Is Electronic Arts the worst company in America? Also, Bioware has finally confirmed they will fix the horrid conclusion of Mass Effect 3 and we discuss the possibilities of Diablo III on Xbox 360. Episode 78 is about hour and a half long. Games investigated in this episode include: Halo 4, Assassins Creed 3, Gears of War 3, Mass Effect 3, Ghost Recon: Future Soldier, Rock Band Blitz, Killer is Dead, Ninja Gaiden 3, Devil May Cry HD Collection, Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, Fez, Awesomenauts, Anomaly: Warzone Earth, Prey 2, Forza Motorsport 4, Transformers: Fall of Cybertron ..plus some other stuff. ENJOY!

item.title: EP 76 - Enjoy Yoself
item.itunes:subtitle: Enjoy Yoself
item.itunes:summary: The crew is back in full effect as we discuss Assassins Creed 3 possibilities, celebrate the release date of Diablo 3 and give the final word on Mass Effect 3. Also, listen in to hear our Jessica Chobot VS Felicia Day Contest Winners! Episode 76 is over an hour and a half long. item.title: EP 33 - Bullet Sponge
item.itunes:subtitle: Bullet Sponge
item.itunes:summary: The chainsaws are slicing and the shotguns are blasting this week on Frag Tag Radio! We almost decided to keep playing the Gears of War 3 Beta and skip recording this week but in the end we took JUST A LITTLE TIME OUT to rant and rave about how awesome Gears of War 3 is! Episode 33 is around 50 minutes long and 80 percent of that is pure Gears Gossip. Games investigated in this episode include: The Gears of War 3 BETA and how we think this is the most EPIC Gears title yet, Followed by discussion about how awesome the new guns are in the Gears 3 Beta, Then we go on and on for what seems like hours about how sweet the maps are in the Gears 3 Beta, and of course we wrap it up with how badass these new executions are in the Gears 3 Beta ..plus maybe a couple other things if we have time. Hidin in the bushes from yo bytchazz... WITH A DOUBLE BARREL SHOTGUN! RREEEEEEVVVIIIVVEEEEE MEEEEEEEEE!

item.title: EP 10 - Costume Contest
item.itunes:subtitle: Costume Contest
item.itunes:summary: Happy Halloween FTR fans! This week we have special guest hosts.. our pals Steve-Oh and The Timinator!
